ygData.subject: Doh! They forget us !!!
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi all guys, it seems that OR we are all on hollidays OR we know all about wizzard :). I don t receive more then 1 list all 2 days now :( Come an guys, we need
ygData.messageBody:
Hi all guys,
it seems that OR we are all on hollidays OR we know all about wizzard :). I
don t receive more then 1 list all 2 days now :(
Come an guys, we need to wake up ! :)
On another point, i just read the new patch message.. Damn.... From the
begining, nothing as been change for the wizzards... They just change during
the patch , the casting time . I have tested BEFORE and after : no change
(that a clock can see, so it s surely a change of let s say 0,001 second or
something like that.In other words : nothing.
All patch just power up the race... Now the druid dot spel are fast like
hell, necro same. And us ?? From the beginning, we have major bug who are
not resolved and they do nothing for us...
Force shock is bugged cause he is resisted too much (and i am ok that he get
resisted so much IF he stun like he must do). The enstill spel doesn't work
(i have tested with root : root is 10 times more effective). I am a playing
a shaman and i think i will stop my wizzard... We have nothing funny : we
just level and wait for what ? Our dd spel nothing more, no buf, no pet, no
life tap, no shield,no dot, no sow, nothing cool except some gate spel...
That s so boring.. For solo from level 8 to 50 you root nuke nuke root nuke
nuke dead... Wow that s pretty funny :( :( :(.
What about our ae spel ? and pe spel ?? Did someone here use them ????
NOBODY...

So guys, we were talking some weeks ago to petition.. Nothing has be done or
you just don t send the letter ???

See you on karana
yakos level 25 wizzard AND dabou level 13 shaman
(playtime for wizzard : 20 days, for shaman , 2 days....)
